Context:
Dr. Colin Simpson is the Dean of the Centre for Continuous Learning at George Brown College. He has played a significant role in establishing George Brown as one of the largest providers of distance education in North America. Colin holds a Doctorate in Electrical Engineering from the University of Hawaii and has been awarded an Honoris Causa Doctor of Letters from Nipssing University. He has lectured at universities including MIT and Texas A&M University, and is an award-winning author with over 300,000 textbooks in print. His best-selling book, Principles of Electronics, is used by over 1,000 colleges and universities worldwide.
